title: Sound On: Capt. Scott Kelly on Ukraine Medical Funding
itunes:title: Sound On: Capt. Scott Kelly on Ukraine Medical Funding
description:
Former NASA astronaut and retired U.S. Navy Captain Scott Kelly discusses his role as United24 Ambassador to raise money for medical supplies and ambulances in Ukraine. He also discusses congressional funding for Ukraine after the midterm elections and the space relationship between the U.S. and Russia. *United24 was launched by the President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy as the main venue for collecting charitable donations in support of Ukraine. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
